title.narrative: Strengthening Civil Society in Afghanistan Programme- Component II - Contract

description.narrative: This activity (Strengthening Civil Society in Afghanistan Programme- Component II - Contract) is a component of Strengthening Civil Society in Afghanistan (Tawanmandi) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £15,521,674. This component benefits Afghanistan, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Legal and judicial development, Democratic participation and civil society. The start date is 01-09-2011 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Public sector policy and administrative management
